DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine ABT-751 decrease tumor , determine long tumor shrinkage maintain patient renal cell cancer . Patients receive ABT-751 mouth daily 21 day . Patients drug 7 day start next cycle drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ABT-751 Patients With Renal Cell Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Renal Cell Carcinoma . Recurrent tumor . At least 6 week postnephrectomy . Able tolerate normal activity daily live . Adequate bone marrow , kidney , liver function . Exclusion Criteria Pregnant breast feeding . Antitumor therapy within 4 week start ABT751 administration . CNS metastasis .
